We are thrilled to have you with us!<br/><br/>We are pleased to announce the new updates:<br/><br/>— SHARED DATA<br/><br/>MTN Shared Data is now available (Awoof and Coupon) at the rate of #250 per GB, valid for 30 days.<br/><br/>Airtel Shared Data is also available at the following rates: 1GB at #245, 2GB at #420 (both valid for 2 days), 3GB at #640 (valid for 7 days), and 10GB at #2250 & 15GB at #3300 (both valid for 30 days).<br/><br/>— VIRTUAL ACCOUNTS<br/><br/>To provide a seamless experience, every user (especially newly registered users) will now be provided with a dedicated virtual bank account for easier wallet funding, without the need of BVN verification.<br/><br/>If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to contact us on WhatsApp at 09038027916<br/><br/>https://wa.me/+2349038027916<br/><br/>Best regards,<br/>The Support Team

Hello Ayodeji Omotere,<br/><br/><br/>I hope this message finds you well.<br/><br/>We would like to inform you that the Nigerian Communications Commission (NCC) has granted approval for a tariff adjustment. In light of this,  our price up on data will commence on Sunday Night.  Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA

Activities that will impact your operation will start on Monday night and we will be sharing the updated data bundle catalogue to reflect the recent increase in tariff.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Please note that we will be implementing this in phases and will be sharing an updated data catalogue for each phase at different times.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>We kindly request your support in ensuring the immediate implementation of these updates across all banking and fintech platforms. Your collaboration will be crucial to ensuring that these changes are reflected immediately and seamlessly.<br/><br/> <br/><br/>Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to your cooperation in achieving this change.<br/><br/><br/>MTN NIGERIA
